gui.seraphim.desc: The closest to the throne of the God, Seraphim pledge to protect. They can evoke a Shield of Fire that burns anything that gets too close.
gui.thrones.desc: At the bottom of the first sphere of heaven, Thrones are vehicles of God. They can bless someone with Wings of Flight that allow you to soar with the Angels.
gui.dominions.desc: A light to guide, the Dominions are holy. At a given time, they can give off a Flash of Light that will blind your foes.
gui.virtues.desc: The intervention of miracles comes through Virtues. They can give someone a Blessing that will allow them to power through even the fiercest of beasts.
gui.powers.desc: The soldiers of Heaven are the Powers.
gui.principalities.desc: Guardians of everything sacred and good, Principalities stand their ground. They can depart from someone and guard a location, preventing entry from anything.
gui.angels.desc: The lowest in all spheres, the Angels are the closest to humanity. A Guardian Angel can protect you from a few hits, given that they don't kill you.
gui.slot_cost.angel: Slotting this Angel will cost %s Karma
gui.swap_cost.angel: Swapping this Angel will cost %s Karma
